titleStmt.title: Document concerning the Sale of a Cow and her Calf
titleStmt.author: @r, son of Ns-#nsw. P3-whr, son of Imn-Htp.

msContents.summary: The document attests to the sale of black cow named St3-irt-bn with her calf to the priest P3-ti-$nm. Both Party A and his father signed the document, in addition to the four witnesses on the Verso. He acknowledges that he will pay a penalty in case of breach the contract.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso has the names of the witnesses
